title: Sportscast - October 22, 2015
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Sportscast - October 22, 2015 CBS 2 Local Sports 
Updated: Thu, Oct 22 2015, 11:24 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 22, 2015. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires 
KHLOE KARDASHIAN, LAMAR ODOM DECIDE TO PULL PLUG ON DIVORCE 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- Adversity has been known to tear many a married couple apart. 
"BACK TO THE FUTURE"-JIMMY KIMMEL 
NEW YORK (AP) -- So, what are the most important developments of the 21st century? Business News 
Applications for US weekly jobless benefits rose last week 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits rose slightly last week but the four-week average declined to the lowest level in more than four decades. It's another sign the job market is healthy. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: SECRET SERVICE ALLOWED TO USE CELL-TRACKING TECHNOLOGY 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- The Secret Service will be allowed to use cellphone-tracking technology -- without getting a court warrant first.
